data.caminho: Rogai por Nos.2021.BRRip.1080p.H264.AC3.Dual - By Tontom/Rogai por Nos.2021.BRRip.1080p.H264.AC3.Dual.Tontom.mkv

dados.overview: Alice is a young hearing-impaired girl who, after a supposed visitation from the Virgin Mary, is inexplicably able to hear, speak and heal the sick. As word spreads and people from near and far flock to witness her miracles, a disgraced journalist hoping to revive his career visits the small New England town to investigate. When terrifying events begin to happen all around, he starts to question if these phenomena are the works of the Virgin Mary or something much more sinister.
dados.tagline: Be careful who you pray to.
dados.title: The Unholy

dados.overview: A wealthy entrepreneur secretly creates a theme park featuring living dinosaurs drawn from prehistoric DNA. Before opening day, he invites a team of experts and his two eager grandchildren to experience the park and help calm anxious investors. However, the park is anything but amusing as the security systems go off-line and the dinosaurs escape.
dados.tagline: An adventure 65 million years in the making.
dados.title: Jurassic Park

data.caminho: 1997 - Jurassic Park 2 - O Mundo Perdido/Jurassic Park O Mundo Perdido (1997)1080p.BluRay.5.1.x264.DUAL.mkv

dados.overview: Four years after Jurassic Park's genetically bred dinosaurs ran amok, multimillionaire John Hammond shocks chaos theorist Ian Malcolm by revealing that he has been breeding more beasties at a secret location. Malcolm, his paleontologist ladylove and a wildlife videographer join an expedition to document the lethal lizards' natural behavior in this action-packed thriller.
dados.tagline: Something has survived.
dados.title: The Lost World: Jurassic Park

dados.overview: Prepare to go deeper into the breathtaking adventures of the Jurassic Park Trilogy!  Highlighted by fascinating, never-seen-before footage from all three Jurassic Park films, this DVD offers an exclusive look at deleted scenes, additional footage and other materials not shown on any theater screen.
dados.title: Beyond Jurassic Park

data.nome: Jurassic World - O Mundo dos Dinossauros

dados.overview: Twenty-two years after the events of Jurassic Park, Isla Nublar now features a fully functioning dinosaur theme park, Jurassic World, as originally envisioned by John Hammond.
dados.tagline: The park is open.
dados.title: Jurassic World

dados.overview: Three years after Jurassic World was destroyed, Isla Nublar now sits abandoned. When the island's dormant volcano begins roaring to life, Owen and Claire mount a campaign to rescue the remaining dinosaurs from this extinction-level event.
dados.tagline: The park is gone.
dados.title: Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom

data.caminho: 2022 - Jurassic World 3 - Domínio/Jurassic World - Domínio 2022 WEB-DL 1080p DUAL 5.1.mkv

dados.overview: Four years after Isla Nublar was destroyed, dinosaurs now live—and hunt—alongside humans all over the world. This fragile balance will reshape the future and determine, once and for all, whether human beings are to remain the apex predators on a planet they now share with history's most fearsome creatures.
dados.tagline: The epic conclusion of the Jurassic era.
dados.title: Jurassic World Dominion

dados.overview: Mufasa, a cub lost and alone, meets a sympathetic lion named Taka, the heir to a royal bloodline. The chance meeting sets in motion an expansive journey of a group of misfits searching for their destiny.
dados.tagline: The story of an orphan who would be king.
dados.title: Mufasa: The Lion King

data.caminho: Studio.Ghibli.1986.2023.1080p/1984 - Nausicaä do Vale do Vento.mkv

dados.overview: After a global war, the seaside kingdom known as the Valley of the Wind remains one of the last strongholds on Earth untouched by a poisonous jungle and the powerful insects that guard it. Led by the courageous Princess Nausicaä, the people of the Valley engage in an epic struggle to restore the bond between humanity and Earth.
dados.tagline: A young girl's love called forth miracles…
dados.title: Nausicaä of the Valley of the Wind

dados.overview: A young boy and a girl with a magic crystal must race against pirates and foreign agents in a search for a legendary floating castle.
dados.tagline: One day, a girl came down from the sky…
dados.title: Castle in the Sky

dados.overview: Two sisters move to the country with their father in order to be closer to their hospitalized mother, and discover the surrounding trees are inhabited by Totoros, magical spirits of the forest. When the youngest runs away from home, the older sister seeks help from the spirits to find her.
dados.tagline: He's your friendly neighbourhood forest spirit!
dados.title: My Neighbor Totoro

dados.overview: In the final months of World War II, 14-year-old Seita and his sister Setsuko are orphaned when their mother is killed during an air raid in Kobe, Japan. After a falling out with their aunt, they move into an abandoned bomb shelter. With no surviving relatives and their emergency rations depleted, Seita and Setsuko struggle to survive.
dados.tagline: Why do fireflies have to die so soon?
dados.title: Grave of the Fireflies

data.nome: O Serviço de Entregas da Kiki
data.caminho: Studio.Ghibli.1986.2023.1080p/1989 - O Serviço de Entregas da Kiki.mkv

dados.overview: A young witch, on her mandatory year of independent life, finds fitting into a new community difficult while she supports herself by running an air courier service.
dados.tagline: I was feeling blue, but I'm better now.
dados.title: Kiki's Delivery Service

dados.overview: In lyrical switches between the present and the past, Taeko contemplates the arc of her life, and wonders if she has been true to the dreams of her childhood self.
dados.tagline: I'm going on a trip with Me.
dados.title: Only Yesterday

data.nome: Porco Rosso O Último Herói Romântico
data.caminho: Studio.Ghibli.1986.2023.1080p/1992 - Porco Rosso O Último Herói Romântico.mkv

dados.overview: In Italy in the 1930s, sky pirates in biplanes terrorize wealthy cruise ships as they sail the Adriatic Sea. The only pilot brave enough to stop the scourge is the mysterious Porco Rosso, a former World War I flying ace who was somehow turned into a pig during the war. As he prepares to battle the pirate crew's American ace, Porco Rosso enlists the help of spunky girl mechanic Fio Piccolo and his longtime friend Madame Gina.
dados.tagline: A pig's got to fly.
dados.title: Porco Rosso

data.caminho: Studio.Ghibli.1986.2023.1080p/1993 - Eu Posso Ouvir o Oceano.mkv

dados.overview: At Kichijōji Station, Tokyo, Taku Morisaki glimpses a familiar woman on the platform opposite boarding a train. Later, her photo falls from a shelf as he exits his apartment before flying to Kōchi Prefecture. Picking it up, he looks at it briefly before leaving. As the aeroplane takes off, he narrates the events that brought her into his life...
dados.title: Ocean Waves

data.nome: PomPoko A Grande Batalha dos Guaxinins
data.caminho: Studio.Ghibli.1986.2023.1080p/1994 - PomPoko A Grande Batalha dos Guaxinins.mkv

dados.overview: The Raccoons of the Tama Hills are being forced from their homes by the rapid development of houses and shopping malls. As it becomes harder to find food and shelter, they decide to band together and fight back. The Raccoons practice and perfect the ancient art of transformation until they are even able to appear as humans in hilarious circumstances.
dados.tagline: A Fantastic Tale Of Survival
dados.title: Pom Poko

dados.overview: Shizuku lives a simple life, dominated by her love for stories and writing. One day she notices that all the library books she has have been previously checked out by the same person: 'Seiji Amasawa'.
dados.tagline: I found someone I like.
dados.title: Whisper of the Heart

dados.overview: Ashitaka, a prince of the disappearing Emishi people, is cursed by a demonized boar god and must journey to the west to find a cure. Along the way, he encounters San, a young human woman fighting to protect the forest, and Lady Eboshi, who is trying to destroy it. Ashitaka must find a way to bring balance to this conflict.
dados.tagline: The fate of the world rests on the courage of one warrior.
dados.title: Princess Mononoke

dados.original_title: ホーホケキョ となりの山田くん
dados.overview: The Yamadas are a typical middle class Japanese family in urban Tokyo and this film shows us a variety of episodes of their lives. With tales that range from the humorous to the heartbreaking, we see this family cope with life's little conflicts, problems, and joys in their own way.
dados.tagline: The safety of family is the wish of the world.
dados.title: My Neighbors the Yamadas

dados.overview: A young girl, Chihiro, becomes trapped in a strange new world of spirits. When her parents undergo a mysterious transformation, she must call upon the courage she never knew she had to free her family.
dados.tagline: On the other side of the tunnel was a mysterious town.
dados.title: Spirited Away

dados.overview: Young Haru rescues a cat from being run over, but soon learns it's no ordinary feline; it happens to be the Prince of the Cats.
dados.tagline: It's not so bad being a cat, now is it?
dados.title: The Cat Returns

dados.overview: Sophie, a young milliner, is turned into an elderly woman by a witch who enters her shop and curses her. She encounters a wizard named Howl and gets caught up in his resistance to fighting for the king.
dados.tagline: The two lived there.
dados.title: Howl's Moving Castle

dados.overview: Something bizarre has come over the land. The kingdom is deteriorating. People are beginning to act strange... What's even more strange is that people are beginning to see dragons, which shouldn't enter the world of humans. Due to all these bizarre events, Ged, a wandering wizard, is investigating the cause. During his journey, he meets Prince Arren, a young distraught teenage boy. While Arren may look like a shy young teen, he has a severe dark side, which grants him strength, hatred, ruthlessness and has no mercy, especially when it comes to protecting Teru. For the witch Kumo this is a perfect opportunity. She can use the boy's "fears" against the very one who would help him, Ged.
dados.tagline: Once Man and Dragon were one. Man chose Land and Sea, Dragon chose Wind and Fire.
dados.title: Tales from Earthsea

data.nome: Ponyo - Uma Amizade que Veio do Mar
data.caminho: Studio.Ghibli.1986.2023.1080p/2008 - Ponyo - Uma Amizade que Veio do Mar.mkv

dados.overview: When Sosuke, a young boy who lives on a clifftop overlooking the sea, rescues a stranded goldfish named Ponyo, he discovers more than he bargained for. Ponyo is a curious, energetic young creature who yearns to be human, but even as she causes chaos around the house, her father, a powerful sorcerer, schemes to return Ponyo to the sea.
dados.tagline: Welcome to a world where anything is possible.
dados.title: Ponyo

dados.original_title: 借りぐらしのアリエッティ
dados.overview: 14-year-old Arrietty and the rest of the Clock family live in peaceful anonymity as they make their own home from items "borrowed" from the house's human inhabitants. However, life changes for the Clocks when a human boy discovers Arrietty.
dados.tagline: Do not be seen by humans. That's been the law of children of the underfloor.
dados.title: The Secret World of Arrietty

dados.overview: Yokohama, 1963. Japan is picking itself up from the devastation of World War II and preparing to host the 1964 Olympics—and the mood is one of both optimism and conflict as the young generation struggles to throw off the shackles of a troubled past. Against this backdrop of hope and change, a friendship begins to blossom between high school students Umi and Shun—but a buried secret from their past emerges to cast a shadow on the future and pull them apart.
dados.title: From Up on Poppy Hill

data.caminho: Studio.Ghibli.1986.2023.1080p/2013 - O Conto da Princesa Kaguya.mkv

dados.overview: Found inside a shining stalk of bamboo by an old bamboo cutter and his wife, a tiny girl grows rapidly into an exquisite young lady. The mysterious young princess enthrals all who encounter her. But, ultimately, she must confront her fate.
dados.tagline: A princess's crime and punishment.
dados.title: The Tale of The Princess Kaguya

dados.overview: A lifelong love of flight inspires Japanese aviation engineer Jiro Horikoshi, whose storied career includes the creation of the A-6M World War II fighter plane.
dados.tagline: We must live.
dados.title: The Wind Rises

dados.overview: Upon being sent to live with relatives in the countryside due to an illness, an emotionally distant adolescent girl becomes obsessed with an abandoned mansion and infatuated with a girl who lives there - a girl who may or may not be real.
dados.tagline: Promise we'll remain a secret, forever.
dados.title: When Marnie Was There

dados.overview: The dialogue-less film follows the major life stages of a castaway on a deserted tropical island populated by turtles, crabs and birds.
dados.title: The Red Turtle

data.caminho: Studio.Ghibli.1986.2023.1080p/2023 - O Menino e a Garça.mkv

dados.original_title: 君たちはどう生きるか
dados.overview: While the Second World War rages, the teenage Mahito, haunted by his mother's tragic death, is relocated from Tokyo to the serene rural home of his new stepmother Natsuko, a woman who bears a striking resemblance to the boy's mother. As he tries to adjust, this strange new world grows even stranger following the appearance of a persistent gray heron, who perplexes and bedevils Mahito, dubbing him the "long-awaited one."
dados.tagline: Where death comes to an end, life finds a new beginning.
dados.title: The Boy and the Heron

dados.overview: A young sex worker from Brooklyn gets her chance at a Cinderella story when she meets and impulsively marries the son of an oligarch. Once the news reaches Russia, her fairytale is threatened as his parents set out to get the marriage annulled.
dados.tagline: Love is a hustle.
dados.title: Anora

dados.overview: After the unexpected death of the Pope, Cardinal Lawrence is tasked with managing the covert and ancient ritual of electing a new one. Sequestered in the Vatican with the Catholic Church’s most powerful leaders until the process is complete, Lawrence finds himself at the center of a conspiracy that could lead to its downfall.
dados.tagline: What happens behind these walls will change everything.
dados.title: Conclave
